feed.title: Proposal: MultiBit as default desktop client on bitcoin.org

entry.title: Proposal: MultiBit as default desktop client on bitcoin.org
entry.summary: In an email conversation from 2013, Alex Kravets expressed his opinion that regular people are not interested in learning new technology and terminology. He believed that this was something that many developers fail to understand. In response to this, Jeff Garzik suggested the use of Bitcoin Wallet for Android, which is a decentralized client that offers network sync and is easy to use. Jeff Garzik is a senior software engineer and open source evangelist at BitPay Inc.
